com.stripe.android

Class Stripe

  • com.stripe.android.Stripe

  • public class Stripe

    Entry-point to the Stripe SDK.

    Supports asynchronous and synchronous methods to access the following Stripe APIs.

    • class PaymentIntent - confirm and retrieve

    • class SetupIntent - confirm and retrieve

    • class PaymentMethod - create

    • class Source - create and retrieve

    • class Token - create tokens for class Card, class BankAccount, class PiiTokenParams, and class AccountParams

    See Also:
    class PaymentIntent, class SetupIntent, class PaymentMethod, class Source, class Token, class Card, class BankAccount, class PiiTokenParams, class AccountParams

    • Constructor Detail

      • Stripe

        public Stripe(android.content.Context context,
              java.lang.String publishableKey,
              java.lang.String stripeAccountId,
              boolean enableLogging)

        Constructor with publishable key and Stripe Connect account id.

        Parameters:
        context - Activity or application context
        publishableKey - the client's publishable key
        stripeAccountId - optional, the Stripe Connect account id to attach to Stripe API requests
        enableLogging - enable logging in the Stripe and Stripe 3DS2 SDKs; disabled by default. It is recommended to disable logging in production. Logs can be accessed from the command line using adb logcat -s StripeSdk

      • Stripe

        public Stripe(android.content.Context context,
              java.lang.String publishableKey,
              java.lang.String stripeAccountId)

        Constructor with publishable key and Stripe Connect account id.

        Parameters:
        context - Activity or application context
        publishableKey - the client's publishable key
        stripeAccountId - optional, the Stripe Connect account id to attach to Stripe API requests

        publishableKey - the client's publishable key

      • confirmPayment

        public void confirmPayment(android.app.Activity activity,
                           ConfirmPaymentIntentParams confirmPaymentIntentParams)

        Confirm and, if necessary, authenticate a class PaymentIntent. Used for automatic confirmation flow.

        Parameters:
        activity - the Activity that is launching the payment authentication flow
        confirmPaymentIntentParams - class ConfirmPaymentIntentParams used to confirm the class PaymentIntent
        See Also:
        class PaymentIntent, automatic confirmation

        Parameters:

      • onPaymentResult

        public boolean onPaymentResult(int requestCode,
                               android.content.Intent data,
                               ApiResultCallback<com.stripe.android.PaymentIntentResult> callback)

        Should be called via Activity#onActivityResult(int, int, Intent)}} to handle the result of a PaymentIntent automatic confirmation (see Stripe.confirmPayment) or manual confirmation (see Stripe.handleNextActionForPayment})

        See Also:
        Stripe.confirmPayment, Stripe.handleNextActionForPayment

      • retrievePaymentIntentSynchronous

        public PaymentIntent retrievePaymentIntentSynchronous(java.lang.String clientSecret)

        Blocking method to retrieve a class PaymentIntent object. Do not call this on the UI thread or your app will crash.

        See Retrieve a PaymentIntent. GET /v1/payment_intents/:id

        Parameters:
        clientSecret - the client_secret with which to retrieve the PaymentIntent
        Returns:
        a class PaymentIntent or null if a problem occurred
        See Also:
        class PaymentIntent, Retrieve a PaymentIntent

      • confirmPaymentIntentSynchronous

        public PaymentIntent confirmPaymentIntentSynchronous(ConfirmPaymentIntentParams confirmPaymentIntentParams)
        Deprecated. 

        Blocking method to confirm a class PaymentIntent object. Do not call this on the UI thread or your app will crash.

        See Confirm a PaymentIntent. POST /v1/payment_intents/:id/confirm

        Parameters:
        confirmPaymentIntentParams - a set of params with which to confirm the PaymentIntent
        Returns:
        a class PaymentIntent or null if a problem occurred
        See Also:
        class PaymentIntent, Confirm a PaymentIntent

      • createSource

        public void createSource(SourceParams sourceParams,
                         ApiResultCallback<com.stripe.android.model.Source> callback)

        Create a class Source asynchronously.

        See Create a source. POST /v1/sources

        Parameters:
        sourceParams - the class SourceParams to be used
        callback - a interface ApiResultCallback to receive the result or error
        See Also:
        class Source, Create a source

      • createSourceSynchronous

        public Source createSourceSynchronous(SourceParams params)

        Blocking method to create a class Source object. Do not call this on the UI thread or your app will crash.

        See Create a source. POST /v1/sources

        Parameters:
        params - a set of class SourceParams with which to create the source
        Returns:
        a class Source, or null if a problem occurred
        Throws:
        - failure to properly authenticate yourself (check your key)
        - your request has invalid parameters
        - failure to connect to Stripe's API
        - any other type of problem (for instance, a temporary issue with Stripe's servers
        See Also:
        class Source, Create a source

      • retrieveSourceSynchronous

        public Source retrieveSourceSynchronous(java.lang.String sourceId,
                                        java.lang.String clientSecret)

        Retrieve an existing class Source from the Stripe API. Note that this is a synchronous method, and cannot be called on the main thread. Doing so will cause your app to crash.

        See Retrieve a source. GET /v1/sources/:id

        Parameters:
        sourceId - the Source.id field of the desired Source object
        clientSecret - the Source.clientSecret field of the desired Source object
        Returns:
        a class Source if one could be found based on the input params, or null if no such Source could be found.
        Throws:
        - failure to properly authenticate yourself (check your key)
        - your request has invalid parameters
        - failure to connect to Stripe's API
        - any other type of problem (for instance, a temporary issue with Stripe's servers)
        See Also:
        class Source, Retrieve a source

      • createAccountToken

        public void createAccountToken(AccountParams accountParams,
                               java.lang.String idempotencyKey,
                               ApiResultCallback<com.stripe.android.model.Token> callback)

        Create a class Token asynchronously.

        See Create an account token. POST /v1/tokens

        Parameters:
        accountParams - the class AccountParams used to create this token
        idempotencyKey - optional, see Idempotent Requests
        callback - a interface ApiResultCallback to receive the result or error
        See Also:
        class Token, Create an account token

      • createAccountToken

        public void createAccountToken(AccountParams accountParams,
                               ApiResultCallback<com.stripe.android.model.Token> callback)

      • createAccountTokenSynchronous

        public Token createAccountTokenSynchronous(AccountParams accountParams,
                                           java.lang.String idempotencyKey)

        Blocking method to create a class Token for a Connect Account. Do not call this on the UI thread or your app will crash.

        See Create an account token. POST /v1/tokens

        Parameters:
        accountParams - params to use for this token.
        idempotencyKey - optional, see Idempotent Requests
        Returns:
        a class Token that can be used for this account.
        Throws:
        - failure to properly authenticate yourself (check your key)
        - your request has invalid parameters
        - failure to connect to Stripe's API
        - any other type of problem (for instance, a temporary issue with Stripe's servers)
        See Also:
        class Token, Create an account token

      • createAccountTokenSynchronous

        public Token createAccountTokenSynchronous(AccountParams accountParams)

        Blocking method to create a class Token for a Connect Account. Do not call this on the UI thread or your app will crash.

        See Create an account token. POST /v1/tokens

        Parameters:
        accountParams - params to use for this token.
        Returns:
        a class Token that can be used for this account.
        Throws:
        - failure to properly authenticate yourself (check your key)
        - your request has invalid parameters
        - failure to connect to Stripe's API
        - any other type of problem (for instance, a temporary issue with Stripe's servers)
        See Also:
        class Token, Create an account token

      • createBankAccountTokenSynchronous

        public Token createBankAccountTokenSynchronous(BankAccount bankAccount,
                                               java.lang.String idempotencyKey)

        Blocking method to create a class Token for a class BankAccount. Do not call this on the UI thread or your app will crash.

        See Create a bank account token. POST /v1/tokens

        Parameters:
        bankAccount - the class Card to use for this token
        idempotencyKey - optional, see Idempotent Requests
        Returns:
        a class Token that can be used for this class BankAccount
        Throws:
        - failure to properly authenticate yourself (check your key)
        - your request has invalid parameters
        - failure to connect to Stripe's API
        - should not be thrown with this type of token, but is theoretically possible given the underlying methods called
        - any other type of problem (for instance, a temporary issue with Stripe's servers
        See Also:
        class Token, class BankAccount, Create a bank account token

      • createBankAccountTokenSynchronous

        public Token createBankAccountTokenSynchronous(BankAccount bankAccount)

        Blocking method to create a class Token for a class BankAccount. Do not call this on the UI thread or your app will crash.

        See Create a bank account token. POST /v1/tokens

        Parameters:
        bankAccount - the class Card to use for this token
        Returns:
        a class Token that can be used for this class BankAccount
        Throws:
        - failure to properly authenticate yourself (check your key)
        - your request has invalid parameters
        - failure to connect to Stripe's API
        - should not be thrown with this type of token, but is theoretically possible given the underlying methods called
        - any other type of problem (for instance, a temporary issue with Stripe's servers
        See Also:
        class Token, class BankAccount, Create a bank account token
